text: She has been enjoying time at home after a busy month working the runway during fashion weeks around the world. And Kendall Jenner was back to her typical cool yet laid - back style as she filmed her family's reality show in Los Angeles on Monday. The star, 22, showcased her trendy and comfortable fashion credentials in a pair of baggy jeans and a flowing white'Cherry'T - shirt with a red collar by Cherry Los Angeles. Cherry on top!
